commit_summary: This commit aims to test the normal operation of validator.py and dispatcher.py, along with related utility scripts. It includes updates to scripts/auto_ops/validator.py, scripts/auto_ops/dispatcher.py, scripts/auto_ops/utils.py, scripts/auto_ops/task_bridge_runner.py, and scripts/auto_ops/output_watcher.py.
log_message: Successfully validated new_task.json and prepared output log for output_watcher.py.
